name: Wally Bot
description: We have developed 3 bots to help DeFi traders gain an edge. We were launched on April 7th 2023 and have continued to build and refine our tools to be more efficient and effective. Wally Wallet Scanner - Provides data on specific wallets with the information pulled directly from Etherscan Wally Collect - Building a database of the most profitable wallets on-chain Wally Chad - Our proprietary copy/trade bot that leverages the Wally Collect database to copy up to 3000 of those profitable wallets in real time with no human involvement it will buy and then sell at profit targets.
